sentences.en: A change in the nature of the ground made the doctor change a way of locomotion.
sentences.cn: 地面上的情况变了,博士不能不换一种移动的方法.

sentences.en: A muscular foot is usually involved in locomotion or burrowing.
sentences.cn: 肌肉质的足常常与(软体动物)运动或挖洞有关.

sentences.en: By land, air or sea, birds are masters of locomotion.
sentences.cn: 无论是通过陆地, 飞越空中还是穿过海洋, 鸟应算是运动能手了.

sentences.en: Class 12 Vehicles; apparatus for locomotion by land, air or water.
sentences.cn: 商标注册类别12车辆; 陆上、中 、 上或水里用运载器.

sentences.en: Class 12 Vehicles; apparatus for locomotion by land, air or water.
sentences.cn: 商标注册类别12车辆; 陆上 、 空中、水上或水里用运载器.

sentences.en: Flight is the form of locomotion that puts the greatest demands on muscles.
sentences.cn: 飞行是对肌肉要求最高的运动形式。

sentences.en: Food sources also elicit oriented locomotion and recognition behavior patterns in most insects.
sentences.cn: 食物源也引诱大多数昆虫定向迁移和识别行为.

sentences.en: He specialises in the mechanics of locomotion.
In slime molds, a projection of the body used for locomotion.
sentences.cn: 伪足:2.粘菌体表所形成的辐射状突起,与其运动有关.

sentences.en: Locomotion had at times seemed impossible.
sentences.cn: 有些时候简直象是寸步难行了.

sentences.en: Some prototypes based on each locomotion are discussed and their novel mechanisms are analyzed.
sentences.cn: 讨论了各种移动类型的例子,分析研究了它们新颖的驱动机构.

sentences.en: Spinal cord. Locomotion . Oculomotor control . Cerebellar structure and function.
sentences.cn: 脊髓, 运动,眼球运动的支配,小脑构造和功能.

sentences.en: That song was the old Grand Funk Railroad hit'Locomotion '.
sentences.cn: 这是一首老 格兰德庞克 铁路流行歌“火车头”.

sentences.en: The liquor density influences the muzzle velocity and the attenuation of spray droplets'locomotion velocity.
sentences.cn: 料液密度影响雾滴喷射的初速度和雾滴运动速度的衰减.

sentences.en: Then came that acceleration of locomotion.
Wireless capsule endoscope was propelled by gastrointestinal peristalsis, thus its locomotion was very slow and uncontrollable.
sentences.cn: 无线胶囊式胃肠道内窥镜是全被动的运动方式,存在运动速度慢和不可控的缺点.

words.tran_cn: 火车头的；运动的；移动的
好旅行的人；有运动力之物；移动发动机

trans.tran_cn: 运动，移动，运动力，移动力
trans.tran_en: movement or the ability to move
